Follows Quilldarts lead and fires her shoulder cannons at the base


--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Quilldart and Galvatron stopped at the scene. Galvatron sent out a 
comm to 
> Megatron. "There can only be one true Megatron on this planet. Come 
let us 
> settle this decepticon style. Fight me now!" He sent shadow star 
the signal.
> 
> Quilldart transformed into robot mode. He sent a comm to the non 
tripred 
> forces there. "We are here to fight the tripreds alone." He shot 
off his horn 
>  missles at the tripred base.
